verses.verse: Does not wisdom <S%H2451><s%> call, <S%H7121><s%> And understanding <S%H8394><s%> lift <S%H5414><s%> up her voice <S%H6963><s%>?

On top <S%H7218><s%> of the heights <S%H4791><s%> beside <S%H5921><s%> the way, <S%H1870><s%> Where <S%H1004><s%> the paths <S%H9350><s%> meet, <S%H9052><s%> she takes <S%H5324><s%> her stand; <S%H5324><s%>
Beside <S%H3027><s%> the gates, <S%H8179><s%> at the opening <S%H6310><s%> to the city, <S%H7176><s%> At the entrance <S%H3996><s%> of the doors, <S%H6607><s%> she cries <S%H7442><s%> out:
"To you, O men, <S%H376><s%> I call, <S%H7121><s%> And my voice <S%H6963><s%> is to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men. <S%H120><s%>
"O naive <S%H6612><s%> ones, <S%H6612><s%> discern <S%H995><s%> prudence; <S%H6195><s%> And, O fools, <S%H3684><s%> discern <S%H995><s%> wisdom. <S%H3820><s%>

"Listen, <S%H8085><s%> for I shall speak <S%H1696><s%> noble <S%H5057><s%> things; <S%H5057><s%> And the opening <S%H4669><s%> of my lips <S%H8193><s%> [will produce] right <S%H4339><s%> things. <S%H4339><s%>
"For my mouth <S%H2441><s%> will utter <S%H1897><s%> truth; <S%H571><s%> And wickedness <S%H7562><s%> is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to my lips. <S%H8193><s%>

"All <S%H3605><s%> the utterances <S%H561><s%> of my mouth <S%H6310><s%> are in righteousness; <S%H6664><s%> There <S%H369><s%> is nothing <S%H369><s%> crooked <S%H6617><s%> or perverted <S%H6141><s%> in them.
"They are all <S%H3605><s%> straightforward <S%H5228><s%> to him who understands, <S%H995><s%> And right <S%H3477><s%> to those who find <S%H4672><s%> knowledge. <S%H1847><s%>
"Take <S%H3947><s%> my instruction, <S%H4148><s%> and not silver, <S%H3701><s%> And knowledge <S%H1847><s%> rather <S%H4480><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> choicest <S%H977><s%> gold. <S%H2742><s%>
"For wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> jewels; <S%H6443><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> desirable <S%H2656><s%> things <S%H2656><s%> can not compare <S%H9586><s%> with her.
"I, wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> dwell <S%H7931><s%> with prudence, <S%H6195><s%> And I find <S%H4672><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%> [and] discretion. <S%H4209><s%>

"The fear <S%H3374><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is to hate <S%H8130><s%> evil; <S%H9563><s%> Pride <S%H1344><s%> and arrogance <S%H1344><s%> and the evil <S%H9563><s%> way, <S%H1870><s%> And the perverted <S%H8419><s%> mouth, <S%H6310><s%> I hate. <S%H8130><s%>
"Counsel <S%H6098><s%> is mine and sound <S%H8454><s%> wisdom; <S%H8454><s%> I am understanding, <S%H998><s%> power <S%H1369><s%> is mine.
"By me kings <S%H4428><s%> reign, <S%H4427><s%> And rulers <S%H7336><s%> decree <S%H2710><s%> justice. <S%H6664><s%>
"By me princes <S%H8269><s%> rule, <S%H8323><s%> and nobles, <S%H5081><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> who judge <S%H8199><s%> rightly. <S%H6664><s%>
"I love <S%H157><s%> those who love <S%H157><s%> me; And those who diligently <S%H7836><s%> seek <S%H7836><s%> me will find <S%H4672><s%> me.
"Riches <S%H6239><s%> and honor <S%H9202><s%> are with me, Enduring <S%H6276><s%> wealth <S%H1952><s%> and righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>

"My fruit <S%H6529><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> gold, <S%H2742><s%> even pure <S%H6337><s%> gold, <S%H6337><s%> And my yield <S%H8393><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> choicest <S%H977><s%> silver. <S%H3701><s%>
"I walk <S%H1980><s%> in the way <S%H734><s%> of righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> In the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the paths <S%H9350><s%> of justice, <S%H4941><s%>
To endow <S%H5157><s%> those who love <S%H157><s%> me with wealth, <S%H3426><s%> That I may fill <S%H4390><s%> their treasuries. <S%H214><s%>
"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> possessed <S%H7069><s%> me at the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of His way, <S%H1870><s%> Before <S%H6924><s%> His works <S%H4659><s%> of old. <S%H6924><s%>
"From everlasting <S%H5769><s%> I was established, <S%H9332><s%> From the beginning, <S%H7218><s%> from the earliest <S%H6924><s%> times <S%H6924><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

"When there <S%H369><s%> were no <S%H369><s%> depths <S%H8415><s%> I was brought <S%H9123><s%> forth, <S%H9123><s%> When there <S%H369><s%> were no <S%H369><s%> springs <S%H4599><s%> abounding <S%H3513><s%> with water. <S%H4325><s%>
"Before <S%H2962><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%> were settled, <S%H2883><s%> Before <S%H6440><s%> the hills <S%H1389><s%> I was brought <S%H9123><s%> forth; <S%H9123><s%>
While <S%H5704><s%> He had not yet made <S%H6213><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> and the fields, <S%H2351><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> the first <S%H7218><s%> dust <S%H6083><s%> of the world. <S%H8398><s%>
"When He established <S%H3559><s%> the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> I was there, <S%H8033><s%> When He inscribed <S%H2710><s%> a circle <S%H2329><s%> on the face <S%H6440><s%> of the deep, <S%H8415><s%>

When He made <S%H553><s%> firm <S%H553><s%> the skies <S%H7834><s%> above, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> When the springs <S%H9407><s%> of the deep <S%H8415><s%> became <S%H5810><s%> fixed, <S%H5810><s%>

When He set <S%H7760><s%> for the sea <S%H3220><s%> its boundary, <S%H2706><s%> So that the water <S%H4325><s%> should not transgress <S%H5674><s%> His command, <S%H6310><s%> When He marked <S%H2710><s%> out the foundations <S%H4144><s%> of the earth; <S%H776><s%>

Then I was beside <S%H681><s%> Him, [as] a master <S%H525><s%> workman; <S%H525><s%> And I was daily <S%H3117><s%> [His] delight, <S%H8191><s%> Rejoicing <S%H7832><s%> always <S%H3605><s%> <S%H6256><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Him,
Rejoicing <S%H7832><s%> in the world, <S%H8398><s%> His earth, <S%H776><s%> And [having] my delight <S%H8191><s%> in the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men. <S%H120><s%>
"Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, [O] sons, <S%H1121><s%> listen <S%H8085><s%> to me, For blessed <S%H835><s%> are they who keep <S%H8104><s%> my ways. <S%H1870><s%>
"Heed <S%H8085><s%> instruction <S%H4148><s%> and be wise, <S%H2449><s%> And do not neglect <S%H6544><s%> [it.]

"Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H120><s%> who listens <S%H8085><s%> to me, Watching <S%H8245><s%> daily <S%H3117><s%> at my gates, <S%H1817><s%> Waiting <S%H8104><s%> at my doorposts. <S%H4201><s%>
"For he who finds <S%H4672><s%> me finds <S%H4672><s%> life, <S%H9132><s%> And obtains <S%H6329><s%> favor <S%H7522><s%> from the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
"But he who sins <S%H2398><s%> against me injures <S%H2554><s%> himself; <S%H5315><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> those who hate <S%H8130><s%> me love <S%H157><s%> death. <S%H4194><s%>"
